scripts.up: yarn && lerna bootstrap && lerna run start --parallel -- --color
scripts.start:manager: lerna run build --stream --scope linode-js-sdk && lerna run start --stream --scope linode-manager -- --color
scripts.start:docker: lerna run build --stream --scope linode-js-sdk && yarn start:all
scripts.docker:test: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'manager' && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/home/node/app/packages/manager/src -v $(pwd)/packages/linode-js-sdk/src:/home/node/app/packages/linode-js-sdk/src manager test
scripts.docker:local: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'manager' && docker run -it --rm -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/home/node/app/packages/manager/src -v $(pwd)/packages/linode-js-sdk/src:/home/node/app/packages/linode-js-sdk/src manager start:docker
scripts.docker:storybook: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'storybook' && docker run -it --rm -p 6006:6006 -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/home/node/app/packages/manager/src -v $(pwd)/packages/linode-js-sdk/src:/home/node/app/packages/linode-js-sdk/src storybook storybook
